short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor and understand opinions expressed from the web and social media, develop deep insights that improve decision making.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enginuity is an easy to use platform that taps you into the intelligence of billions of online active users to listen to and understand their opinions about your content, your brand, your products, your market and competitors.

What you get with Enginuity Analytics

- See Exactly How Your Content is Perceived
- Listen to Relevant Conversations
- Monitor your owned, earned and paid content.
- Monitor Twitter Timelines.
- Easily get all social share metrics for your content.
- Share and track your content curation to your social channels.
- Instantly Export Data
- Receive Smart Email Reports
